Action.author: luckforzhang
Action.body: java SDK has done the work and when shall this idemix for node sdk could be released?

Action.author: mwest
Action.body: Last I heard about this we were waiting from feedback from the crypto team. This isn't a team that meets regularly so I'm unclear of the status of the approval of the design. If you have any updates from the crypto team, or an approval of the design that would help us get started. Thanks,

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Hi, I've been working through the node sdk backlog with the maintainers and I've reduced the severity of this one, as it doesn't look active right now

Action.author: lesleyannj
Action.body: Backlog Review - Closing due to inactivity. Can be re-opened if work starts again.
